channel.title: Mosque at Ground Zero
channel.description:
http://www.foxnews.com/us/2010/05/25/community-board-votes-support-plans-mosque-cultural-center-near-nycs-ground/
How perfectly [b]un[/b]fitting. I can't even imagine how pissed off some people will be.

item.title: Mosque at Ground Zero
item.dc:creator: @_bool
item.description:
@_bool wrote:

[quote=“The Reaper X, post:54, topic:349008”][quote author=(Anthony) link=topic=445381.msg3272387#msg3272387 date=1279305570]

fuck u its perfectly fitting im muslim and am glad they r going to do this less people at the mosque i go to when its done

Perfectly fitting? You do realize the terrorists that caused 9/11 were Muslim…

LOL retard they are muslim extremists, muslims believe in peace and equality.

If your thick enough to think that every muslim hates america/wants to kill themselves in a plane for it then you should crawl up and die, its pathetically stupid to even hold such a view.

But they are still of the Muslim culture, no? Get off of my thread.

So what, plenty of religious extremists do things that are harmful to people, etc.
Hell, the kids that did the Columbine massacre were Christians, should be never let another Christian into that school?
You are all only saying this because they are MUSLIM. If it was Christian extremists who flew planes into the WTC then you would happily let them build a church.
[/quote]WHY THE FUCK CAN’T THEY BUILD IT ANYWHERE ELSE?![/quote]
IT’S NEAR GROUND ZERO WHY THE FUCK SHOULDN’T THEY BE ABLE TO BUILD A RELIGIOUS TEMPLE NEAR GROUND ZERO?

Read full topic

item.title: Mosque at Ground Zero
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“casey., post:49, topic:349008”]Muslims died at the WTC also morons.

Way to be typical “OH I THINK I AM SMART SO LET ME GO DEBATE AT A DIEING RUNESCAPE CHEATING SITE ABOUT MY OPINION”

Being from New York, I have no problem with this. Then again I’m not an ignorant idiot and realize all Muslims aren’t about to kill Americans.[/quote]
I dont think all Muslims are out to kill Americans.

Imagine you’re studying on American history. Think of how it sounds.

9/11 2001 Committed by an extremist group that happened to be Muslim

2011 Muslim Mosque built on ground zero

“Sounds like a victory”.

There is nothing really wrong with it, but its irony will draw way to much attention from Americans. I wouldn’t be surprised if it was burned (already mentioned)

Also jme was right. This thread was made it straightforward that it was being built on ground zero soil, which is much more of an issue than building it near it.

@Anthony There are Muslims who disagree with the building to. One was interviewed today actually, but i havent slept and i dont remember her first name. It was along side an argument of the ban in France and (soon) the US from Muslims wearing body covering clothes because it can be used to conceal weapons etc. If Saddam didn’t use all the income from oil sales to build his military instead of helping his country then it wouldn’t be so unstable. It makes/lets people do stuff that leads to bans like this. -Argument i spent months with Radeon on, don’t really have the time to go over it again.

Basically it doesn’t bother me so much that its near it. But it would be in better regards to the owners of the mosque and the residents to not build it there.

Read full topic

[/quote]
They can request to have it moved.[/quote]

item.title: Mosque at Ground Zero
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“Thug-life, post:36, topic:349008”][quote author=Frell link=topic=445381.msg3270576#msg3270576 date=1279167756]

I don’t see a problem with it.

Come visit us, the muslim mosque. Location: ground zero.

uhhhhhhhhh
[/quote]

Ugh, so?

The IRA bombed Manchester (UK). Lets ban every Irish person from setting up business or living in Manchester!
The Columbine shooters were both Christian, lets ban Christian kids from going to school in America!

Extremists bombed the London underground and a bus, they happened to follow islam - lets ban all those that follow islam from using the underground and busses in London.

Extreme examples, same bullshit stereotyping.

The only problem here is you primitive fucking Americans. Are you really incapable of understanding that no, It wasn’t the muslims who did it - it was a group extremists who the vast majority of muslims would also condemn.

Also, before any of you start. I believe all religion is bullshit, this isn’t me trying to defend muslims - I have no reason to.[/quote]
If they really cared about their religion they would find a spot out in new york state or another part of the city to build it and not draw attention.

Read full topic
